html.p: If a matrix [mathjaxinline]M[/mathjaxinline] has [mathjaxinline]m[/mathjaxinline] rows and [mathjaxinline]n[/mathjaxinline] columns, we say that [mathjaxinline]M[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix. For instance,

is a [mathjaxinline]3\times 5[/mathjaxinline] augmented matrix, since it has 3 rows and 5 columns. The coefficient matrix of the above system would be a [mathjaxinline]3\times 4[/mathjaxinline] matrix.
